com.exlibris.digitool.repository.api

Interface IEEditor


  • public interface IEEditor
    An interface for retrieval and editing of control's DnxDocuments and DublinCore. Taking into consideration performances issues, background Maps manage all DnxDocumentsHelper and DublinCore objects that have been modified.
    Author:
    yaarac

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DublinCore> getChangedDcs()
      Returns a Map consisting of changed pids and their changed DublinCore objects.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DnxDocumentHelper> getChangedDnxs()
      Returns a Map consisting of changed pids and their changed DnxDocumentHelper objects.
      DublinCore getDc(java.lang.String pid)
      Returns a DublinCore object for a given control by its pid.
      DublinCore getDcForIE()
      Returns a DublinCore object for the given IE.

      Returns a DnxDocumentHelper object for a given control by its pid.

      Returns a list of File identifiers by the given representation pid.

      Returns the identifier of the IE this IEEditor is working on.

      Returns a list of representation identifiers for the given IE.

    • Method Detail

      • getDc

        DublinCore getDc(java.lang.String pid)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a DublinCore object for a given control by its pid.
        Parameters:
        pid - the control's identifier
        Returns:
        A DublinCore object representing the control's descriptive metadata
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if can't find the specified metadata or if fails to create a DublinCore document

      • getDcForIE

        DublinCore getDcForIE()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a DublinCore object for the given IE.
        Returns:
        A DublinCore object representing the IE's descriptive metadata
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if can't find the specified metadata or if fails to create a DublinCore document

      • getDnxHelper

        DnxDocumentHelper getDnxHelper(java.lang.String pid)
                               throws com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException
        Returns a DnxDocumentHelper object for a given control by its pid.
        Parameters:
        pid - the control's identifier
        Returns:
        A DnxDocumentHelper object wrapping a DnxDocument object representing the control's DNX
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException - if can't find the specified DnxDocument

      • getDnxHelperForIE

        DnxDocumentHelper getDnxHelperForIE()
                                    throws com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException
        Returns a DnxDocumentHelper object for the given IE.
        Returns:
        A DnxDocumentHelper object wrapping a DnxDocument object representing the IE's DNX
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException - if can't find the specified DnxDocument

      • getFilesForRep

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFilesForRep(java.lang.String repPid)
                                                throws com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException
        Returns a list of File identifiers by the given representation pid.
        Parameters:
        repPid - the representation's identifier
        Returns:
        A list of file identifiers under the given representation.
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getReps()

        Returns a list of representation identifiers for the given IE.
        Returns:
        A list of representation identifiers under the given IE.
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException

         java.lang.String pid)
        Sets the given DublinCore object for the given control, by its pid.

        dc - the given DublinCore object to set
        pid - the control's identifier

      • getChangedDnxs

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DnxDocumentHelper> getChangedDnxs()
        Returns a Map consisting of changed pids and their changed DnxDocumentHelper objects. For Interal use only.
        Returns:
        A Map of changed DnxDocumentHelper objects and their control pid as key.

      • getChangedDcs

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DublinCore> getChangedDcs()
        Returns a Map consisting of changed pids and their changed DublinCore objects. For Interal use only.
        Returns:
        A Map of changed DublinCore objects and their control pid as key.
